President Trump: s claim that "Bob Corker gave us the Iran Deal" is contradicted by the fact that Corker vocally opposed the deal and urged Republican colleagues to reject it.
Corker himself voted against the Iran De: indicating that he did not support or give credibility to the agreement.
White House press secretary Sarah Huckab: s sponsorship of the Iran Nuclear Agreement Review Act paved the way for the deal and gave it credibility.
The Corker: sponsored legislation, the Iran Nuclear Agreement Review Act, passed with overwhelming majorities in both chambers of Congress and was signed into law in May 2015. Corker's office described the law as enhancing Congress' authority over the Iran Deal.
